[roast.board]
host_target = roast.component.board.target_board:TargetBoard
network_target = roast.component.board.target_board:TargetBoard

[roast.component.system]
hwflow = roast.component.hwflow:HwbuildRunner

[roast.relay]

[roast.serial]
